to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
Leye county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi

sentences.english: Social management improved step by step. Social stability was ensured and the.people lived and worked in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 社会管理逐步完善，社会大局稳定，人民安居乐业。

sentences.english: The famous-brand product of Leye organic thorny pear shall be found to promote production development well. 5.
sentences.chinese: 创立乐业“名牌”有机刺梨，促进生产良性发展。

sentences.english: Stardom in the entertainment industry is very fickle, and Bollywood is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐业中的明星制是变化无常的，宝莱坞也不例外。

sentences.english: As far as Mr Adelson is concerned, he is in the integrated-resort business.
sentences.chinese: 爱德森先生说，他做的是综合娱乐业。

sentences.english: It can drive the development of other industries such as entertainment and hotels.
sentences.chinese: 它能促进其他产业如娱乐业和酒店业的发展。

sentences.english: Hong Chengli of recreational industry parvenu discovered her artistic talent.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐业新贵洪承礼发现了她的艺术天分。

sentences.english: Leisure industry mainly refers to tourism and recreation.
sentences.chinese: 休闲业主要指旅游业和娱乐业。

sentences.english: For instance, tourism and entertainment could experience an 80% decline in demand.
sentences.chinese: 例如，观光事业和娱乐业的需求经历了下降80%。

sentences.english: The ideal life for Chinese is to live and work in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 中国人的理想生活方式就是安居乐业。

sentences.english: Looking at the size structure of Putian City, the entertainment industry, there is still much room for development.
sentences.chinese: 纵观莆田市娱乐业的规模结构，仍有很大的发展空间。

sentences.english: I hope that the country prospers and the people are at peace.
sentences.chinese: 我希望国家繁荣昌盛，人民安居乐业。

sentences.english: Illicit use of TV signals is not only bad for the entertainment industry.
sentences.chinese: 非法使用电视信号不仅对娱乐业造成了不良影响。

sentences.english: And the one they fancy most is the home-entertainment business.
sentences.chinese: 他们设想的目标市场是家庭娱乐业。

sentences.english: In time of peace, people can live and work in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 身处太平之世，人民方能安居乐业。

sentences.english: Democracy at the grassroots level will be better practiced. People will enjoy a sound public order and live and work in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 基层民主更加健全，社会秩序良好，人民安居乐业。

sentences.english: Illicit use of TV signals is not only bad for the entertainment industry.
sentences.chinese: 非法使用电视信号不仅对娱乐业造成了不良影响。
